name: Dungeon Defenders II
summary: The Old Ones’ armies have invaded Etheria and it’s up to you and your friends to push them back! Create a team of heroes to take into battle. Then freeze, burn, and electrocute enemies with your deadly defenses or jump into the action yourself to finish them off! Play by yourself or with up to three friends in 4-player online co-op.
info:
• 中文名: 地牢守护者2
  • 平台: Windows
  • 游戏类型: RPG
  • 游玩人数: 1~4人
  • 发行日期: 2014年12月5日
  • 官方网站: http://store.steampowered.com/app/236110
